overview:
Greg Clark brings to Mincom over 23 yearsâ€™ experience in advanced logistics, supply chain management, security, online operations, and enterprise-scale applications. During his career, he has successfully grown two start-ups into significant global brands.

Prior to his appointment, he was President and Chief Executive Officer of E2open, a leader in ERP-agnostic global supply chain applications. During his tenure, Greg took E2Open from an early startup into a market-leading solutions provider supporting over 15,000 international customers.
